This endpoint will be used by the Receiver (PISP) to poll for the status of all Recurring Payments. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/718406041/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+Autom+ticos+-+v2.0.0-beta.2), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS or a SecretKey (the same mechanics used by our Webhooks)."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Get Recurring Payments by RecurringConsentPactualId"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/pix/recurring-payments/v2/consent/{recurringConsentPactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to receive Recurring Payment consultations. This endpoint will be used by the Receiver (PISP) to poll for the status of all Recurring Payments. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/718406041/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+Autom+ticos+-+v2.0.0-beta.2), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS or a SecretKey (the same mechanics used by our Webhooks). 
The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the PaymentId as a route or query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"recurringConsentPactualId","description":"The Recurring Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"startDate","description":"Initial date for the query.","schema":{"format":"date","maxLength":10,"type":"string","example":"2021-05-21"},"in":"query","required":false},{"name":"endDate","description":"End date for the query.","schema":{"format":"date","maxLength":10,"type":"string","example":"2021-05-21"},"in":"query","required":false},{"name":"originalRecurringPaymentId","description":"Identifier of the recurringPaymentId of the first payment try that failed. If informed, the query must return all payments related to this originalRecurringPaymentId.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","required":false}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
